answers.answer: That is how I was for a couple days before I went into labor :)
Did you take anything or drink anything to feel better i feel really nasty nd tired ):

Lot's of water and rest. Other than that I just stuck it out. The diharrea is a blessing in disguise though because it is what helped me go into labor. My doctor said it was my body getting rid of all the nasty stuff.
This is exactally hiw i was the day before i went into labor. Maybe call your docter cause they thought i had preeclampsia

Cant rest just feel really sick need to sit up doubt ill be getting any rest tonightKeep using the rest room tooI took tums to make me feel a little better but other than that im having no signs of labor im due march 1rst
Now my whole back is starting to hurt
Diarrhea is a sign of labor about to begin. At least that's what my OB told me.
And I am 38 weeks 4 days due march 2nd but being induced monday.
Thanks thinking of going to er
Wish my doctor would schedule to induce me hes the type to let his patients go past due date

it is a sign of labor coming I had both of my boys at 38 weeks one was 38 weeks 5 days and my last one was at 38 weeks exactly like not even 10 minutes after I took my belly picture he broke my water hang in there call your doctor and now I'm pregnant with baby number 3
Crazy my Water just broke at 1:50

question: Im 38 weeks and 5 days pregnant , is this normal to have stomach ache , my tummy feels like its tight and hard i need fresh air i feel like vomiting but i cant 7 up did not help nor is ginger aleI used the rest room embarrassing to say but i had diarrheai am so exhausted of being pregnant i have swollen feet i waddleIve walked all day today and know i feel really sick what should i do
title: stomach ache feel like vomiting nausea comes and goes
